typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		created_at as timestamp,
		updated_at as timestamp,
		transaction_id as string,
		provider_slug as string,
		identified as boolean,
		source as string,
		data as string,
		match_group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DLHarmoniaImportTransaction
source(output(
		id as integer,
		created_at as timestamp,
		updated_at as timestamp,
		mid as string,
		loyalty_scheme_id as integer,
		payment_provider_id as integer,
		location as string,
		postcode as string,
		store_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DLHarmoniaMerchantIdentifier
source(output(
		id as integer,
		created_at as timestamp,
		updated_at as timestamp,
		slug as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DLHarmoniaLoyaltyScheme
source(output(
		id as integer,
		created_at as timestamp,
		updated_at as timestamp,
		slug as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DLHarmoniaPaymentProvider
DLHarmoniaImportTransaction alterRow(upsertIf(not(isNull(updated_at)))) ~> AlterRow1
DLHarmoniaMerchantIdentifier alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
DLHarmoniaLoyaltyScheme alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow3
DLHarmoniaPaymentProvider alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow4
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	batchSize: 2000,
	mapColumn(
		id,
		created_at,
		updated_at,
		transaction_id,
		provider_slug,
		identified,
		source,
		data,
		match_group
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true) ~> DWHImportTransaction
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	batchSize: 2000,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DWHMerchantIdentifier
AlterRow3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	batchSize: 2000,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DWHLoyaltyScheme
AlterRow4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	batchSize: 2000,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DWHPaymentProvider
